programme.title: Minority Report
programme.desc: In the future, criminals are caught before the crimes they commit, but one of the officers in the special unit is accused of one such crime and sets out to prove his innocence.

programme.title: Hard Target 2
programme.desc: Disgraced and retired mixed martial artist Wes “The Jailor” Baylor (Scott Adkins) couldn't refuse the million-dollar purse offered to fight in Myanmar.

programme.title: Gangs Of New York
programme.desc: In 1863, Amsterdam Vallon returns to the Five Points area of New York City seeking revenge against Bill the Butcher, his father's killer.

programme.title: Carrie
programme.desc: A reimagining of the classic horror tale about Carrie White, a shy girl outcast by her peers and sheltered by her deeply religious mother, who unleashes telekinetic terror on her small town after being pushed too far at her senior prom.

programme.title: King Kong
programme.desc: Oscar® winner Peter Jackson directs Naomi Watts, Jack Black and Adrien Brody in this cinematic vision filled with non-stop action, terrifying creatures and groundbreaking special effects.

programme.title: Aeon Flux
programme.desc: In the 25th century, a virus has decimated mankind. Political conflicts, though, have taken their toll. Into this setting, acrobatic assassin Aeon Flux makes a dangerous trek to take out the government's top leader.

programme.title: The Bourne Supremacy
programme.desc: The action continues with Oscar® winner Matt Damon as assassin Jason Bourne in this state-of-the-art espionage thriller packed with some of the most intense chase sequences ever filmed!

programme.title: The Bourne Ultimatum
programme.desc: Jason Bourne (Matt Damon) is back in a non-stop race around the globe from a new generation of skilled CIA operatives as he finally learns the truth behind his mysterious past.

programme.title: Spider-Man: Homecoming
programme.desc: Peter Parker balances his life as an ordinary high school student in Queens with his superhero alter-ego Spider-Man, and finds himself on the trail of a new menace prowling the skies of New York City.

programme.title: Around The World In 80 Days
programme.desc: It is 1872, and a British inventor, a Chinese thief and a French artist set off to circumnavigate the globe in 80 days. They travel by land, air, sea, and in-line skates in order to beat the clock and finish where they started.

programme.title: The Patriot
programme.desc: Peaceful farmer Benjamin Martin is driven to lead the Colonial Militia during the American Revolution when a sadistic British officer murders his son.

programme.title: Blade Runner 2049
programme.desc: K, an officer with the Los Angeles Police Department, unearths a secret that could create chaos. He goes in search of a former blade runner who has been missing for over three decades.

programme.title: Air Warriors S5 - U-2 Dragon Lady
programme.desc: The CIA’s covert reconnaissance aircraft, the U-2 Dragon Lady, has a turbulent history marked with political scandals. Uncover the secrets of America’s most legendary spy plane and watch as it’s pushed to its limit to stay off enemy radar.

programme.title: Air Warriors S6 - Ac-130 Spectre
programme.desc: Follow the rise, fall, and rebirth of the AC-130 gunship, a four-prop behemoth that revolutionized American air support in the ’60s. See how a design weakness sidelined it during Operation Desert Storm in the ’90s and triggered a successful redesign.

programme.title: All The Food In All The World - Fine Dining
programme.desc: Explore the best fine dining restaurants from around the United States of America. We meet the imaginative chefs behind these dazzling menu’s, and of course we taste some unique and extraordinary dishes.

programme.title: All The Food In All The World - Mexican Food
programme.desc: It is all about Mexican food. We travel the U.S. in search of unique and authentic dishes. Discover these meals in some unexpected places and of course we have a few margaritas along the way.

programme.title: All The Food In All The World - Dessert
programme.desc: It is all about dessert. We travel the U.S. in search of the most mouth warming dishes we can find. From sweet to savoury, we take a bite into some unforgettable treats.

programme.title: All The Food In All The World - Barbecue
programme.desc: It is all about barbecue. From Texas to California, and even in Hawaii, we sample the best barbecue the country has to offer.

programme.title: Essence Of India - EP1
programme.desc: Samira convinces chefs to part with their secrets, cooks with street vendors and wanders into ancient spice markets to give you a peek into India’s rich culinary heritage.

programme.title: Essence Of India - EP2
programme.desc: Samira convinces chefs to part with their secrets, cooks with street vendors and wanders into ancient spice markets to give you a peek into India’s rich culinary heritage.

programme.title: Essence Of India - EP3
programme.desc: Samira convinces chefs to part with their secrets, cooks with street vendors and wanders into ancient spice markets to give you a peek into India’s rich culinary heritage.

programme.title: Essence Of India - EP4
programme.desc: Samira convinces chefs to part with their secrets, cooks with street vendors and wanders into ancient spice markets to give you a peek into India’s rich culinary heritage.

programme.title: Destination Flavour: Singapore - EP1
programme.desc: Adam Liaw catches up with a cousin from his father's side of the family to learn how he has been making Hainanese chicken rice for over 30 years.

programme.title: Tom Cruise: Lights Camera Action
programme.desc: Having just turned 60, Tom Cruise is still one of the leading names in Hollywood. A prolific actor with a career spanning over 40 years, he is continually building a giant legacy within the film industry.

programme.title: The Rock: Moving Mountains
programme.desc: Whether it’s the money or the muscles, you don’t mess with The Rock! Wrestling star turned Hollywood megastar carved himself a path to becoming king of the entertainment industry and brings his one of a kind charisma, charm and signature smile to everything he touches.

programme.title: Andy Warhol: A Life In Art
programme.desc: Andy Warhol had an extraordinary ability to find the sacred in the profane. Like many successful Americans, he was a product of Eastern European immigrant experience, who himself became an icon.

programme.title: Armstrong
programme.desc: Dramatic, moving and insightful, Armstrong tells the definitive life story of Neil Armstrong - from his childhood in rural Ohio, through aerial combat in Korea, to his first steps on the Moon - and the unwanted celebrity status that ensued.

programme.title: Loch Lomond: A Year In The Wild - Winter
programme.desc: The winter is mild and wet, which is good news for some but bad news for others. Red deer are forced to higher ground, salmon have gone six months without food, mountain hares turn a conspicuous white, and squirrels kick their own young out of the nest.

programme.title: Creatures Of The Lagoon
programme.desc: Marine biologists explore Florida’s Indian River Lagoon to discover the secrets of the many fascinating creatures that inhabit it.

programme.title: Canada: A Year In The Wild - Autumn
programme.desc: With days growing shorter and colder, Canadian wildlife is in a race against time, and any animal that fails to make the most of what autumn has to offer will perish.

programme.title: Canada: A Year In The Wild - Winter
programme.desc: Winter in Canada is both cruel and beautiful; in the grip of snow and ice, and animals are struggling; however, while some animals hunker down, others have babies to raise who need to adjust to their environment swiftly.

programme.title: Extraordinary Dogs - The Power In Movement Part 1
programme.desc: Italy's water resue dogs, New Zealand's search and rescue dogs and Australia's team of competitive Alaskan huskies.

programme.title: Extraordinary Dogs - The Mystery Of Healing Part 1
programme.desc: Max is a part of the "Cancer and Bio-detection Dogs" team. Napal is an assistance dog in the USA and Belgium's seizure alert dog, Maybe, sends alerts to his owner before an epileptic seizure.

programme.title: Extraordinary Dogs - Myth & Reality
programme.desc: Dogs in New Zealand can detect human emotions? A pet miniature Schnauzer can predict someone's death? How do dogs really communicate with each other?

programme.title: Extraordinary Dogs - Crucial Hearing
programme.desc: A Jack Russell Terrier barks when he ears the unique sound of a life threatening occurrence. How are dogs trained to provide assistance? Amos, trained by Hearing Dogs for Deaf People UK helps his owner through some difficult times.

programme.title: The Mountain Lion And Me
programme.desc: Follow the lives of an elusive mountain lion and her three cubs in Paradise Valley, Montana. Get a rare glimpse into their lives and a deeper understanding of a previously unknown animal.

programme.title: Yorkshire: A Year In The Wild - Autumn
programme.desc: Autumn is on hold as summer continues, with unexpectedly balmy conditions throwing a life line to the roe deer as they prepare for the winter ahead. For other animals, mating season has arrived, making for a testosterone-fuelled time at Ravenscar Beach.

programme.title: Yorkshire: A Year In The Wild - Winter
programme.desc: Despite its delayed arrival, for the Grey Seals at Ravenscar Beach winter means it is time to give birth. The newborn pups are now on the fast track to adulthood, with just three weeks to gain as much weight as possible before their mothers move on.

programme.title: Attenborough's Life In Colour - Seeing In Colour
programme.desc: Millions of years ago, the first animals had eyes that were unable to distinguish color -- yet as that changed, ‘seeing in color’ gave animals many advantages, whether to find food, attract a mate or warn off an enemy.

programme.title: Attenborough's Life In Colour - Hiding In Colour
programme.desc: David Attenborough reveals some of the natural world’s most cunning tricksters and masters of disguise. Discover how some animals use color to hide and disappear into the background, or to trick and deceive.

programme.title: Attenborough's Life In Colour - Chasing Colour
programme.desc: Find out the stories behind the scientific research on animal colors - from robotic frogs wrestling with real-life counterparts, to spiders wearing eyeliner to attract mates.

programme.title: Hellboy

programme.title: Doom: Annihilation
programme.desc: Based on the popular original video game, Doom: Annihilation is an explosive, terrifying thrill ride.

programme.title: The Eye
programme.desc: A blind girl receives a cornea transplant so that she is able to see again. However, she gets more than she bargains for when she realizes she can see disturbing ghosts.

programme.title: Essence Of India - EP4
programme.desc: Samira convinces chefs to part with their secrets, cooks with street vendors and wanders into ancient spice markets to give you a peek into India’s rich culinary heritage.

programme.title: Destination Flavour: Singapore - EP1
programme.desc: Adam Liaw catches up with a cousin from his father's side of the family to learn how he has been making Hainanese chicken rice for over 30 years.

programme.title: Destination Flavour: Singapore - EP2
programme.desc: Adam learns to make authentic beef rendang from a local Muslim family. He visits the National Archives of Singapore to learn about his mother's family, and continues his search for inspiration for his Singapore banquet dinner.

programme.title: Destination Flavour: Singapore - EP3
programme.desc: Adam visits Peranakan food legend Violet Oon's restaurant, National Kitchen. He then heads to Chinatown to visit Aussie Dave Pynt's restaurant, Burnt Ends.

programme.title: Destination Flavour: Singapore - EP4
programme.desc: Adam goes in search of the best seafood that Singapore has to offer. His journey begins inside the Marina Bay Sands resort complex where many celebrity chefs have opened eateries.

programme.title: The Lost Tapes S2 - Tornado Super Outbreak
programme.desc: Witness how America's South and Midwest were ravaged by 148 twisters in just 18 hours.

programme.title: Mystic Britain S2 - Gods And Monsters
programme.desc: Clive and Mary-Ann investigate 34,000 years of Britain’s Gods and Monsters. The intrepid duo hunt for King Arthur, uncover the gates of hell, and decipher some very rude ancient graffiti in search of answers to Britain’s most mystic mysteries.

programme.title: Air Warriors S5 - Harrier
programme.desc: It has the grace of a chopper, the knockout punch of a fighter jet, and has sparked its fair share of controversy. Discover the story behind the Harrier, the jet Marines rely on for close-air support, through interviews with those who know it best.

programme.title: Air Warriors S5 - Kc-135 Stratotanker
programme.desc: It is the backbone of American air power, carrying up to 200,000 pounds of fuel in a single flight. Explore the long history behind the KC-135 Stratotanker, an aerial refueler that keeps fighter jets flying around the globe and around the clock.

programme.title: Exceptional Engineering S2 - The Plane Makers
programme.desc: Over 16,000 workers and engineers design, produce and deliver industry leading aircraft throughout the European Union at the Airbus factory in Hamburg-Finkenwerder.

programme.title: Exceptional Engineering S2 - Highway Bound
programme.desc: Every ten minutes, a new truck rolls off the assembly line, with a tailor-made production line equipped to cater to individual customer requirements at the Swedish automotive group, Volvo.

programme.title: The Real Mad Men Of Advertising - The 1950s
programme.desc: See how ad campaigns from the '50s launched new American traditions and the promise of a bright tomorrow.

programme.title: The Real Mad Men Of Advertising - The 1960s
programme.desc: Examine '60s ad men and women and how they used wit and irony to reach a new audience, consequently revolutionizing the industry.

programme.title: The Mountain Lion And Me
programme.desc: Follow the lives of an elusive mountain lion and her three cubs in Paradise Valley, Montana. Get a rare glimpse into their lives and a deeper understanding of a previously unknown animal.

programme.title: Yorkshire: A Year In The Wild - Autumn
programme.desc: Autumn is on hold as summer continues, with unexpectedly balmy conditions throwing a life line to the roe deer as they prepare for the winter ahead. For other animals, mating season has arrived, making for a testosterone-fuelled time at Ravenscar Beach.

programme.title: Yorkshire: A Year In The Wild - Winter
programme.desc: Despite its delayed arrival, for the Grey Seals at Ravenscar Beach winter means it is time to give birth. The newborn pups are now on the fast track to adulthood, with just three weeks to gain as much weight as possible before their mothers move on.

programme.title: Attenborough's Life In Colour - Seeing In Colour
programme.desc: Millions of years ago, the first animals had eyes that were unable to distinguish color -- yet as that changed, ‘seeing in color’ gave animals many advantages, whether to find food, attract a mate or warn off an enemy.

programme.title: Attenborough's Life In Colour - Hiding In Colour
programme.desc: David Attenborough reveals some of the natural world’s most cunning tricksters and masters of disguise. Discover how some animals use color to hide and disappear into the background, or to trick and deceive.

programme.title: Attenborough's Life In Colour - Chasing Colour
programme.desc: Find out the stories behind the scientific research on animal colors - from robotic frogs wrestling with real-life counterparts, to spiders wearing eyeliner to attract mates.

programme.title: All The Food In All The World - Fine Dining
programme.desc: Explore the best fine dining restaurants from around the United States of America. We meet the imaginative chefs behind these dazzling menu’s, and of course we taste some unique and extraordinary dishes.

programme.title: All The Food In All The World - Mexican Food
programme.desc: It is all about Mexican food. We travel the U.S. in search of unique and authentic dishes. Discover these meals in some unexpected places and of course we have a few margaritas along the way.

programme.title: All The Food In All The World - Dessert
programme.desc: It is all about dessert. We travel the U.S. in search of the most mouth warming dishes we can find. From sweet to savoury, we take a bite into some unforgettable treats.

programme.title: All The Food In All The World - Barbecue

programme.title: Go Youth!
programme.desc: Four teenagers, each with unique dreams, passions, and fears, attempt to navigate through the contemporary adult world of Mexico City. The pursuit of their youthful ideals is met with setbacks along the way as we follow in their journey.

programme.title: The Peace And Love Process
programme.desc: Marie and Simon, a couple with two children, are deeply in love despite constant fights in their paired life. To save their marriage, they come up with a chart of Ten Rules to seek love and peace.

programme.title: Homicide Unit Istanbul: Thailand (1)
programme.desc: A prisoner transfer to Thailand goes horribly wrong for Detectives Mehmet and Mustafa when the pair are kidnapped by a local crime family and Mehmet is forced to break their boss out of prison to save Mustafa’s life.

programme.title: The Grump: In Search Of An Escort
programme.desc: The Grump, a stubborn old Finnish farmer, goes on a quest to find a replacement for his beloved second-hand car. He goes to Germany to do so, but ends up settling accounts with his past.

programme.title: The Happiest Girl In The World
programme.desc: Delia, an 18-year-old girl from a small Romanian town learns that she has won a car in a contest, and she travels to Bucharest with her parents to claim it. All goes well, until Delia and her family starts to disagree on what to do with the car.

programme.title: Sarah Kohr: Silent Death
programme.desc: In a sealed factory with the highest security precautions, the destruction of deadly substances is underway. However, the lead chemist is kidnapped along with a canister of Sarin gas - an invisible and odourless poison that kills within minutes.

programme.title: Monsoon Baby
programme.desc: After years of failed IVF treatments, Nina and Mark turn to an Indian surrogate. As they anxiously await their baby, the surrogate vanishes, prompting the desperate couple to embark on a frantic search for her and their unborn child.

programme.title: Intimate Stranger
programme.desc: In post-COVID Tokyo, single mother Megumi is desperate to find her missing son Shinpei. After a shady young man claims to know her son’s whereabouts, he is invited into Megumi’s home where he soon uncovers a shocking secret.

programme.title: Homicide Unit Istanbul: Thailand (2)
programme.desc: With his colleague’s life on the line, Inspector Mehmet has to bust Thai crime boss Worawit out of jail. But an ambush by the Red Dragon gang leaves Worawit kidnapped and Mehmet injured and semi-conscious. How will Mehmet save his colleague now?

programme.title: Not Here To Be Loved
programme.desc: Jean-Claude is a disillusioned middle-age man who has long forgotten to smile. He is divorced, has a strained relationship with his only son and thinks his father never loved him. Then, he steps in to a tango school and meets Francoise and life changes.

programme.title: Jirga
programme.desc: In this bracingly raw film about vindication and grace, an Australian ex-soldier goes to Afghanistan to seek absolution from the family of a civilian he had killed in the war. And it will be the 10 year old son of the deceased who will decide his fate.

programme.title: It Can't Be Real
programme.desc: A sobering film about moving on from childhood traumas – jazz singer Leyla grew up in a broken and dysfunctional family. A chance encounter with a mysterious photographer Murat unhinges her deep-seated pessimism in life and teaches her how to love again.

programme.title: Built To Scale
programme.desc: Lou, company misfit, builds a miniature model of her office and discovers she has the magical ability to control the real world. As she attempts to use it, she discovers that she is inadvertently reproducing the very toxicity she is trying to escape.

programme.title: Heavenly Nomadic
programme.desc: A family of nomads dwelling high in the mountains of Kyrgyzstan doesn't need any of the conveniences of modern civilization in order to be happy. But progress is creeping into their lives regardless, destroying legends and traditions as it comes.

programme.title: All For Diego
programme.desc: Pablo and Diego are two brothers working as dishwashers at a bar while playing soccer in the afternoons. After Diego falls victim to a hit and run, Pablo enters into a soccer tournament in order to pay for the surgeries needed to keep his brother alive.
